function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unknown survival of COVID-19 in greywater","Impact":"Potential spread of the virus through greywater","Mitigation":"Separation and treatment of greywater to limit pathogen spread","Technologies":"Water treatment technologies, greywater recycling systems","People":"Residents, water treatment authorities, public health departments","Owner":"Water treatment authorities, public health departments"},{"Description":"Increased pressure on energy sources during pandemics","Impact":"Failures in energy provision, discomfort in home practices","Mitigation":"Development of backup energy sources, promotion of sustainable energy sources","Technologies":"Backup energy systems, sustainable energy technologies","People":"Residential building owners, energy providers, policymakers","Owner":"Residential building owners, energy providers, policymakers"},{"Description":"Improper segregation of medical waste","Impact":"Risk of improper disposal and spread of contaminated waste","Mitigation":"Proper segregation and management of medical waste","Technologies":"Waste segregation systems, medical waste treatment technologies","People":"Healthcare workers, waste management authorities, public health departments","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, waste management authorities, public health departments"}]}
